LanguageData.DutyTally_WorkloadTip: How busy this pawn is. Can be a simple job count or weighted by priority (P1=4, P2=3, P3=2, P4=1). You can change this in the mod settings.
LanguageData.DutyTally_IgnoreInvisibleWorkTypesTip: Tick this box to ignore jobs you don't normally see in the work tab (like 'Finish Off' from Allow Tool) when figuring out the workload.
LanguageData.DutyTally_UseWeightedPrioritiesTip: Tick this box to score workload based on priority (P1=4, P2=3, P3=2, P4=1). Leave it unchecked for a simple job count.
